name: Laserpunk (Demo)
description:
Defeat as many evil robots trying to disrupt your research as possible! How long can you survive?

Your laser will build up heat as you fire, doing more damage the higher its temperature. Be careful though, because if you get too hot it will overheat, leaving you helpless for a short period of time.

Tip: Dashing is both briefly invincible, and releases some heat, so make sure to do it when it's safe.

Controls

  • W/A/S/D: Move
  • Space: Select/Jump
  • Shift: Dash
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left Click: Shoot

Credits:

Fonts: m5x7 and m6x11 by Daniel Linssen

SFX: Kenney.nl and Splice

All other assets: Made by me during the nine days of Level Up Circle #1.

Special thanks to GDQuest for excellent tutorials (especially regarding the laser beam and camera shake).
